PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FlowMovingDeviceFan
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Fan occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcFlowMovingDevice.

PropertyDef.Name: DischargeType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the type of connection at the fan discharge. Duct: Discharge into ductwork. Screen: Discharge into screen outlet. Louver: Discharge into a louver. Damper: Discharge into a damper.

PropertyDef.Name: ApplicationOfFan
PropertyDef.Definition: The functional application of the fan: SUPPLYAIR: Supply air fan. RETURNAIR: Return air fan. EXHAUSTAIR: Exhaust air fan. OTHER: Other type of application not defined above.

PropertyDef.Name: CoilPosition
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the relationship between a fan and a coil. DrawThrough: Fan located downstream of the coil. BlowThrough: Fan located upstream of the coil.

PropertyDef.Name: MotorPosition
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the location of the motor relative to the air stream. InAirStream: Fan motor is in the air stream. OutOfAirStream: Fan motor is out of the air stream.

PropertyDef.Name: FanMountingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the method of mounting the fan in the building.

PropertyDef.Name: FractionOfMotorHeatToAirStream
PropertyDef.Definition: Fraction of the motor heat released into the fluid flow.

PropertyDef.Name: ImpellerDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Diameter of fan wheel - used to scale performance of geometrically similar fans.
